languages.text: {n}Френзо чуть хмурится.{/n} "Признаюсь, иногда у меня возникали мысли выйти... за некоторые рамки устава".
{n}He frowns slightly.{/n} "I will admit that I have been occasionally tempted to... overstep certain boundaries in the ship's regulations."
languages.original_text: {n}Френзо чуть хмурится.{/n} "Признаюсь, иногда у меня возникали мысли выйти... за некоторые рамки устава".

languages.text: {n}Frunce el ceño levemente.{/n} «Admito que en ocasionas me ha tentado... superar ciertos límites de las regulaciones de la nave».
languages.original_text: {n}He frowns slightly.{/n} "I will admit that I have been occasionally tempted to... overstep certain boundaries in the ship's regulations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Frunce el ceño levemente.{/n} «Admito que en ocasionas me ha tentado... superar ciertos límites de las regulaciones de la nave».

languages.text: {n}彼はかすかに眉をひそめた。{/n}「認めます。私は確かに時々…船の規則を破ったことがあります」
languages.original_text: {n}He frowns slightly.{/n} "I will admit that I have been occasionally tempted to... overstep certain boundaries in the ship's regulations."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はかすかに眉をひそめた。{/n}「認めます。私は確かに時々…船の規則を破ったことがあります」

languages.text: {n}他微微皱起眉头。{/n}“我承认，我偶尔可能会受到诱惑，想要……越过船上规定的界限。”
languages.original_text: {n}He frowns slightly.{/n} "I will admit that I have been occasionally tempted to... overstep certain boundaries in the ship's regulations."

traits.locale_text: {n}他微微皱起眉头。{/n}“我承认，我偶尔可能会受到诱惑，想要……越过船上规定的界限。”

languages.text: {n}Er verzieht leicht das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich räume ein, dass ich hin und wieder versucht war ... bestimmte Vorgaben im Regelwerk des Schiffs zu überschreiten."
languages.original_text: {n}He frowns slightly.{/n} "I will admit that I have been occasionally tempted to... overstep certain boundaries in the ship's regulations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er verzieht leicht das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich räume ein, dass ich hin und wieder versucht war ... bestimmte Vorgaben im Regelwerk des Schiffs zu überschreiten."

languages.text: {n}Il se renfrogne légèrement.{/n} « Je reconnais que j'ai parfois été tenté de... passer outre certaines règles fondamentales en vigueur à bord du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}He frowns slightly.{/n} "I will admit that I have been occasionally tempted to... overstep certain boundaries in the ship's regulations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se renfrogne légèrement.{/n} « Je reconnais que j'ai parfois été tenté de... passer outre certaines règles fondamentales en vigueur à bord du vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}Hafifçe kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "İtiraf ediyorum ki arada sırada... Gemi yönetmeliklerindeki belirli sınırları aşma hususunda aklım çeliniyor."
languages.original_text: {n}He frowns slightly.{/n} "I will admit that I have been occasionally tempted to... overstep certain boundaries in the ship's regulations."
